name: Shobji Bhorta
description: A traditional Bangladeshi dish made with mashed vegetables including potatoes, eggplant, pumpkin, and carrots, mixed with spices and mustard oil for a flavorful, spicy side dish.

name: Chorchori
description: A mixed vegetable stir-fry made with pumpkin, eggplant, potatoes, carrots, green beans, and ridge gourd, seasoned with panch phoron and mustard oil.

name: Daal with Vegetables
description: A nutritious lentil soup cooked with spinach, eggplant, potatoes, tomatoes, and spices, served hot with rice.

name: Aloo Phulkopi
description: A flavorful curry made with potatoes and cauliflower, cooked with tomatoes, green chilies, onions, and a blend of spices, perfect with rice or roti.
